data.fullContent: Carbon composition resistors can be printed directly onto printed circuit board (PCB) substrates as part of the PCB manufacturing process. Although this technique is more common on hybrid PCB modules, it can also be used on standard fibreglass PCBs. Tolerances are typically quite large, and can be in the order of 30 %. A typical application would be non-critical pull-up resistors.
data.answer: 碳合成电阻可以直接印刷到印刷电路板(PCB)基板作为PCB制造过程的一部分。虽然这种技术在混合PCB模块上更常见，但它也可以用于标准的玻璃纤维PCB。公差通常是相当大的，可以在30%左右。一个典型的应用是非关键的上拉电阻。
